thread.title: Marshmallow-only Lucky Charms exist, but there's a catch
thread.title_full: Marshmallow-only Lucky Charms exist, but there's a catch

author: Matt Mauney
title: Marshmallow-only Lucky Charms exist, but there's a catch
text:
Marshmallow-only Lucky Charms exist, but there's a catch Lucky Charms Marshmallows Only 
General Mills is launching a social media campaign where 10 fans will win boxes of marshmallow-only Lucky Charms. 
General Mills is launching a social media campaign where 10 fans will win boxes of marshmallow-only Lucky Charms. Matt Mauney Contact Reporter Orlando Sentinel Ever dreamed of a box of Lucky Charms containing only marshmallows? Your dream could come true 
Unlike unicorns, marshmallow-only boxes of of Luck Charms cereal are a thing -- or at least will be for 10 lucky cereal lovers. 
General Mills has teamed up with rapper Biz Markie to launch a new social media marketing campaign , which asks Lucky Charms fans to post pictures of themselves holding an imaginary box of the popular cereal on Twitter or Instagram using the hashtag #Lucky10Sweepstakes. 
Ten winners will receive a box of "Marshmallow Only Lucky Charms," which the company calls the "unicorn of the cereal world â€“ fantasized about, but never seen." 
The promotional video for the sweepstakes stars Markie and is set to the rapper's 1989 earworm classic "Just a Friend." You can check out the cheesy remix above. 
My question is, do the winners also get a free blood glucose test?
